/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -msse2 -mfpmath=sse -march=core2 -mtune=core2  -O3 -g     -m64 CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/bitmap.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/hash.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/hashtable.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/pair.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/random.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/list.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/mt19937ar.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/thread.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/__/lib/vector.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/gene.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/genome.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/segments.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/sequencer.c.o CMakeFiles/genomeSTM64.dir/table.c.o  -o genomeSTM64 -rdynamic ../../libstm/libstm64.a -lpthread -lrt
